content: If anyone is using the HSPC Sandbox, or wants to use it, and needs any help, please message me (Jacob Crump). Give me your name and table number and I'll come and help you.

Hey everyone,
If you want help with the use or support of the HSPC Sandbox, PM me with your name and table and I'd love to help out. We've recently implemented some new features which includes CDS Hook management and demoing, profile (i.e. us-core, QI-core, etc.) uploading and validation, and SMART on FHIR 1.0 support.
Thanks!
